State.Author: xNVSE Team
State.Description: The New Vegas Script Extender, or NVSE for short, is a modder's resource that expands the scripting capabilities of Fallout: NV. It does so without modifying the executable files on disk, so there are no permanent side effects.
State.Name: New Vegas Script Extender (NVSE xNVSE)

State.Author: hman101
State.Description: An alternate start mod that let's you choose your character's background and delays the main quest until you want to start it (or if you want just ignore it entirely).
State.Name: Alternate Start with Delayed Main Quest

State.Author: Roni8501
State.Description: Atmospheric Lighting Tweaks makes changes to Image Spaces and Lighting Templates to give interiors a more dynamic and atmospheric look.
State.Name: Atmospheric Lighting Tweaks (Interior Lighting for FNV and TTW)

State.Author: PlatinumShad0w
State.Description: Tweaks to make the Mojave Brotherhood a better faction, including more sources of fame, fixed ending slide conditions, additional repair services, improved diversified leveled lists and a new weapon.
State.Name: Better Brotherhood

Original.Name: Brave New World - Revoice Only (Scripted) Hotfix-69562-1-6-1-1647427354.7z

State.Author: The BNW Team
State.Description: Brave New World is a project that gathers the work of professional voice actors, carefully selected to revoice Fallout: New Vegas. The mod revoices roughly 7,000 lines of vanilla dialogue and covers 145 NPCs.
State.Name: Brave New World

State.Author: Scott Clam
State.Description: An overhaul of the weathers in New Vegas with 360 panoramic cloud textures, improved lighting and DLC support. TTW version available.
State.Name: Desert Natural Weathers - NV - TTW

State.Author: VishVadeva
State.Description: Patches for TTW and FNV.
State.Name: Vish's Patch Hub (FNV-TTW)

State.Author: Kazopert
State.Description: Adds a fully functional post-game world to the game, no longer will you be brought to the credits and end your journey there. Instead, you will realise the consequences of what endings you've gotten and explore a vastly changed world.
State.Name: FPGE - Functional Post Game Ending

State.Author: yvileapsis and others
State.Description:
A collection of my mods, merged for convenience. 

Requires JIP LN NVSE and JohnnyGuitar NVSE.
State.Name: JAM - Just Assorted Mods

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: JSawyer's popular mod, fully re-implemented from the ground up. Compatibility has been greatly improved, errors have been fixed, and balance corrections have been expanded - all whilst trying to maintain the original mod's vision.
State.Name: JSawyer Ultimate Edition

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Adds ammo variants, reloading parts, and weapon mods as loot; provides comprehensive options for configuring and integrating Gun Runners' Arsenal; fixes item naming conventions; and improves recipes.
State.Name: Mojave Arsenal

State.Author: Someteam2000
State.Description: Pursue high-risk/high-reward bounties in the first installment of the The Someguy Series.
State.Name: New Vegas Bounties I LE

State.Author: gurk_meja
State.Description:
Sunny Smiles is now a fully featured companion,
with voice and lip-sync.
State.Name: Sunny Smiles Companion

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This mod makes explosive traps use explosives, survival, or science skills instead of repair, which is already super useful.
State.Name: Traps Tweaks - Traps Use Other Skills

State.Author: TheKraken
State.Description: Tired of missing rewards from casinos simply by being too lucky on the slot machine? This mod is the solution.
State.Name: Unmissable Casino Rewards

State.Author: Xilandro - master JazzIsParis - DarianStephens
State.Description: This mod adds weapon inertia. Part of Project B42. Thanks to JazzIsMagic... I mean Paris. ;)
State.Name: B42 Weapon Inertia

State.Author: throttlekitty
State.Description: Adds animated eyelashes to the characters of Fallout:New Vegas
State.Name: Eyelashes New Vegas

State.Author: jazzisparis
State.Description: This mod is designed to revolutionize the way companions are controlled and interacted with, rendering the companion-wheel obsolete and bringing new elements of team-work and tactics, with the intention of making the game look and feel more as a proper role-playing game than as an action-shooter.
State.Name: JIP Companions Command and Control

State.Author: Cheesehole
State.Description: Adds more locations to game at the more sparse areas of worldspace. Integrates few elements of DLC into base game and makes exploring worthwhile thing to do.
State.Name: MoreMojave

Original.Name: Sweet 6 Shooter Perk Pack NV Version-73438-16-18-1698520402.rar

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: The Sweet 6 Shooter perk pack adds 99 perks and 22 traits in a vanilla friendly, immersive way. Featuring specialization perks for many weapon and armor types, this perk pack aims to flesh out the perk selection throughout the game for just about every playstyle, with a heavy focus on proper balance and role-playing.
State.Name: Sweet 6 Shooter Perks - TTW - NV

State.Author: anhatthezoo - with help from the xNVSE team
State.Description: Another script extender plugin.
State.Name: AnhNVSE

State.Author: WebbProductionsEntertain Sweet6Shooter and many others
State.Description: Hello folks!!! The mod that you have all waited for around a year for is finally out. With many classic weapons added to your New Vegas game the possibilities are endless.
State.Name: Classic Fallout Weapons Remastered

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: Cleans up HUD textures (such as the compass ticks or other arrows) that have went unnoticed. The cleaning consists of removing the old noise, and sometimes i replace the old noise with a new one.
State.Name: Clean Vanilla Hud

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description: Improves framerate in combat by fixing an engine bug that lowered framerate while attacking an enemy with a health-bar visible.
State.Name: Combat Lag Fix (NVSE)

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: This is a lore-friendly, mostly hand-drawn, total overhaul mod that tweaks around 3600 icons. They are immersively more consistent in terms of coloring and transparency. There are other bug fixes too, and many new details! Okay, just write that in the brief overview, it's not that hard.
State.Name: Consistent Pip-Boy Icons v4

State.Author: PushTheWinButton and the New Vegas Mafia
State.Description: A collection of small vanilla-friendly gameplay improvements that have been fully merged, updated, and cleaned.
State.Name: Essential Vanilla Enhancements Merged

State.Author: rockbiter68
State.Description: Collects, improves, and polishes the most recently released Clean Animation sets animations into a single download. Uses and requires kNVSE. No iron sight adjustment or patching necessary.
State.Name: FNV Clean Animations - Part 3

State.Author: rockbiter68
State.Description: Collects all post-Part 1 animations into a single download. Makes revisions, tweaks, and edits where necessary. Adds a bonus set: the Grenade Machinegun. Comes bundled with Iron Sight alignment fixes.
State.Name: FNV Clean Animations - Part 2

State.Author: rockbiter68
State.Description:
FNV Clean Animations, now featuring good idles and remade animations.



Brand new + revised animation sets for various weapons from FNV/TTW. Includes various fix, features, and tweaks to upgrade the original Part 1 and bring it up to speed.
State.Name: FNV Clean Animations - Reborn - Part 1

State.Author: Ehamloptiran Sheson and FNVEdit Team
State.Description: An almost one click LOD generator for Fallout: New Vegas
State.Name: FNVLODGen

State.Author: emoose
State.Description: xNVSE plugin that almost completely fixes the exterior lighting bug, and allows up to 4x the number of active lights!
State.Name: Improved Lighting Shaders

State.Author: Stentorious
State.Description: Pixel perfect iron sight alignment for the animation pack of your choice. Covers 100% of Base Game + DLC + TTW weapons. B42 Optics supported. WAP supported.
State.Name: Iron Sights Aligned

State.Author: Stentorious
State.Description: Pixel perfect iron sight alignment for the animation pack of your choice. Covers 100% of Base Game + DLC + TTW weapons. B42 Optics supported. WAP supported.
State.Name: Iron Sights Aligned

State.Author: tomzik
State.Description: A collection of new, low poly models to use during generating LOD.
State.Name: LOD additions and improvements

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description:
Engine bugfixes, optional tweaks and new features with no performance impact. Fully customisable via in-game menu and INIs. 

Adds support for Inventory Searching, Cookable Grenades, Manual Reload, Smooth Aiming, WASD Menu Support and more. 

Fully compatible with TTW and The Frontier.
State.Name: lStewieAl's Tweaks and Engine Fixes

State.Author: Ashtonlp101
State.Description: A small unmarked quest featuring a large dungeon with tons of new, custom assets.
State.Name: Lucky Jim's Cache

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist aka LOC - Devastatin Dave
State.Description: A total overhaul to every Map Marker icons, also including an extension that replaces 87 generic Map Markers Icons with something that is more memorable and unique.
State.Name: Map Marker Icons

State.Author: RoyBatty and SciRika
State.Description: Optimizations and fixes for a large selection of meshes in the base game and DLC.
State.Name: New Vegas Mesh Improvement Mod - NVMIM

State.Author: Xilandro
State.Description: If you can throw it - you can pick it up. With Reforged, now even better than ever!
State.Name: Retrievable Throwables Reforged

State.Author: StealthDick
State.Description: Experience a new level of gameplay with Subjugation - Slavery and Capture Mechanics mod. Send defeated foes to Caesar's Legion or the ruthless Manhunters faction. Fully voice acted and adds 2 new quests!
State.Name: Subjugation - Slavery and Capture Mechanics

State.Author: Tecium
State.Description: New models and textures to improve the LOD.
State.Name: TCM's LOD Overhaul

State.Author: Pelinor
State.Description: Allows any number of mods to be configured from a single menu.
State.Name: The Mod Configuration Menu

Original.Name: YUP - Base Game and All DLC-51664-12-8-1690541884.7z

State.Author: Yukichigai - Currently maintained by sandbox
State.Description: A compilation of vital bug fixes for Fallout: New Vegas and its DLC, all combined into one ESM.  The only pure bug fix compilation available on the Nexus: no new features, no balance tweaks, no restored content.  Just bug fixes and nothing but bug fixes.  Available in English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, and Russian.
State.Name: Yukichigai Unofficial Patch - YUP

State.Author: zedas
State.Description: An enhancement to the shoddy work on the vanilla functional streetlamps & lights of Outer Vegas, Camp McCarran, Camp Golf, and NCRCF.
State.Name: A Little More Lamplight

State.Author: Hitman47101
State.Description: Threw everything I had into one pack to celebrate 10 years of... this.
State.Name: Anniversary Anim Pack

State.Author: Xilandro Axeuora
State.Description:
Adds working Dual-Render Scopes into Fallout New Vegas!  

OMG it's just like SKYR-... uhh... S.T.A.L.K.E.R.!
State.Name: B42 Optics - ESPless

State.Author: Stentorious
State.Description: Adds B42 Optics functionality to a number of New Vegas mods. Including AWOP, Dead Money Tweaks, Salt Lake Stories, and more!
State.Name: B42 Optics NV Patches

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: This is a interface overhaul that cleans up all of the smudgy Icons and the textures surrounding the Companion Wheel while retaining the original design as much as possible.
State.Name: Clean Companion Wheel

State.Author: Stentorious
State.Description: Replaces all Just Assorted Mods (JAM) textures with cleaned up versions. Covers JDC, JHI, JHM, JVO, and JWH.
State.Name: Clean Just Assorted Mods (JAM)

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist
State.Description: This is a faithful recreation of the Vault Boy Paper Doll. You'll see the paper doll when you take damage or in the Condition menu in your Pip-Boy. Fixes a couple of alignment issues too.
State.Name: Clean Vault Boy Paper Doll

State.Author: Arccharger and the AM Team
State.Description: Tired of those pesky scorpions being like blue? Ants that are supposedly based on black ants? Green mantis' in our desert? Well look here for more natural retextures of these beloved creatures!
State.Name: Desert Natural Creatures

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: A collection of small essential gameplay improvements for the official DLCs that have been fully merged, updated, and cleaned.
State.Name: Essential DLC Enhancements Merged

State.Author: Johnsonn Hopper31 anonx1987 Player
State.Description: Fully animated and implemented into lvl lists Crossbow with new ammo types, model taken from Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War
State.Name: FNV Crossbow

State.Author: zzjay
State.Description: modder's resource
State.Name: HD Teeth and Natural Eyelashes and Eyebrows

State.Author: TheKraken
State.Description: Higher resolution versions of JIP companions command and control's icons.
State.Name: JIP CCC HD icons

State.Author: Ghost8919
State.Description: When Bethesda made Fallout 3, they didn't include weapon ADSing. When Obsidian made Fallout: New Vegas, they added it in, though didn't add it to every weapon. Among those are the AER and AEP series of Laser Arms. This mod looks to change that. After all, Laser Weapons need Iron Sights too!
State.Name: Laser Weapon Iron Sights

State.Author: SirCorneliusJ
State.Description:
LOADed 2.0 - Ammo Overhaul is designed from the ground-up to completely overhaul ballistic weapon balance and the ammunition crafting systems in FNV



Every ammunition type has been redesigned, giving every one a distinct role within New Vegas's combat sandbox
State.Name: LOADed 2.0 - Ammo Overhaul

State.Author: Osip
State.Description: This mod add LOD for a many objects and fixes some vanilla LOD meshes.
State.Name: More LODs Additions and fixes

State.Author: Ghost8919
State.Description: When Bethesda made Fallout 3, they didn't include weapon ADSing. When Obsidian made Fallout: New Vegas, they added it in, though didn't add it to every weapon. Among those are the AER and AEP series of Laser Arms. This mod looks to change that. After all, Laser Weapons need Iron Sights too!
State.Name: Laser Weapon Iron Sights

Original.Name: Project Nevada Legacy - Rail Cannon - Main File-83338-1-0-1696453030.7z

State.Author: Zealotlee
State.Description: Adds a standalone Rail Cannon from Project Nevada with leveled list integration.
State.Name: Project Nevada Legacy - Rail Cannon

State.Author: Doros
State.Description:
Adds almost 100 songs split between five new radio stations, divided up by genre. Includes period-friendly rockabilly, big band, country and gospel, and pop rock tunes, as well as a Raider-controlled psychobilly station for the modern greaser in all of us.

UPDATE! Bonus Christmas radio station now available! Happy Holidays, Wastelands!
State.Name: Radio Free Wasteland

State.Description:
Adds almost 100 songs split between five new radio stations, divided up by genre. Includes period-friendly rockabilly, big band, country and gospel, and pop rock tunes, as well as a Raider-controlled psychobilly station for the modern greaser in all of us.

UPDATE! Bonus Christmas radio station now available! Happy Holidays, Wastelands!

State.Description: This mod makes door window and small window under door semitransparent.
State.Name: Semitransparent Door Glass(plugin version)

Original.Name: Skill Bonus Misc. items V2 - Complete Edition (All-in-One Update 2)-70372-V-8-1644151805.zip

State.Author: Ghille Attano AKA Shirtless Pants
State.Description: This mod is a standalone (and updated) version of my previous, now hidden, Skill Bonus Misc. Items. This mod includes all of the misc. items with new models, textures, and leveled-list integration via scripts. Different versions with different requirements are available.
State.Name: Skill Bonus Misc. Items V2 - Complete Edition

State.Description: completely arbitrarily changes a lot of perfect meshes for no reason

State.Description: completely arbitrarily changes a lot of perfect meshes for no reason

I always tought vanilla hairs werw a bit too hiny...this mod will fix that.

Normalmaps replacer for vanilla hairs.

Original.Name: 1. Butcher Pete Complete - A Melee Animation Overhaul (Hitman Locomotion)-79146-1-0-1669917098.rar

State.Author: rockbiter68
State.Description:
A comprehensive melee animation overhaul for almost every single one-handed melee weapon in New Vegas, its DLCs, and TTW.



Chop, slice, and bludgeon that Pete.
State.Name: Butcher Pete Complete - A Melee Animation Overhaul

State.Description: Let's face it. Non-lethal play in vanilla New Vegas is pretty... meh. This mod changes that a lot.

State.Name: Consistent Pip-Boy Icons v5 - Framework Plugin

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: A simple and comprehensive loot scarcity mod using event-based scripting. Trust us. Bring a magazine.
State.Name: Famine - A Loot Rarity Mod

State.Author: The Dormies - Demorome and Trooper
State.Description:
An NVSE plugin which adds new functions and engine-level tweaks.

For heathens who have forsaken the Vanilla-Style way.
State.Name: ShowOff xNVSE Plugin

State.Author: jazzisparis and LuthienAnarion
State.Description:
This plugin is an extension of the New Vegas Script Extender (NVSE). It adds 1000+ new functions, which can be used in GECK scripting and (in some cases) as conditions.

Additionally, this mod includes numerous engine bug fixes/tweaks, and restores several broken game features.
State.Name: JIP LN NVSE Plugin

State.Author: The BNW Team
State.Description: Brave New World is a project that gathers the work of professional voice actors, carefully selected to revoice Fallout: New Vegas. The mod revoices roughly 7,000 lines of vanilla dialogue and covers 145 NPCs.
State.Name: Brave New World

State.Author: lStewieAl - Hitman47101
State.Description: Aim down sights without the camera snapping to place. Engine plugin, no esps or animation files - compatible with all animation mods.
State.Name: Smooth True Iron Sights Camera

State.Author: VishVadeva
State.Description: Patches for TTW and FNV.
State.Name: Vish's Patch Hub (FNV-TTW)

Original.Name: Essential DLC Enhancements Merged - JSUE Patch-77945-1-0-1691327911.7z

State.Author: VishVadeva
State.Description: Patches for TTW and FNV.
State.Name: Vish's Patch Hub (FNV-TTW)

State.Author: hman101
State.Description: Allows you to purchase items that are on display in a shop without having to go through the barter menu with a merchant.
State.Name: Purchase Items on Display (xNVSE)

State.Author: Nehred
State.Description: Fixes a vanilla issue about the Strip lights not showing in certain parts of the map.
State.Name: Strip Lights Region Fix

State.Author: Made by ElPascal and friends
State.Description: This mod adds hundreds of NPCs and several scripted events to the world of Fallout: New Vegas; people patrolling the roads, traveling between towns, occupying locations, exploring the desert and reacting dynamically to your choices throughout the game. The Mojave will never feel empty again.
State.Name: The Living Desert - Travelers Patrols Consequences Increased Population and more

State.Author: Johnsonn Hopper31 anonx1987 Player and S6S
State.Description:
This is an overhaul to the crossbow mod that fixes the issue of the weapon not animating when a save is loaded with it equipped.

TTW support, retrievable bolts, overhauled integration, world placements, and many other adjustments have been made.
State.Name: Crossbow Overhaul

State.Author: VishVadeva - Qolore7
State.Description: Files needed while following Viva New Vegas.
State.Name: Viva New Vegas Resources

State.Author: Xilandro x Carxt x JazzIsParis
State.Description: This mod, thanks to JazzIsParis magic, adds diagonal movement. Simple as that.
State.Name: Diagonal movement

State.Author: B42
State.Description: Dynamically adds ISControl node system animation support + easy per-weapon sights adjustment
State.Name: ISControl Enabler and Ironsights adjuster (now ESPless)

State.Author: spockthewok
State.Description: A collection of tweaks for certain audio files to fix popping issues and other annoyances (no ESP).
State.Name: Misc Audio Tweaks and Fixes

State.Author: Slander
State.Description: You're a pacifist not a vegan. So be free to hunt animals and defend yourself from deathclaws and other monsters.
State.Name: Fatigue Overhaul - Thou Shalt Kill Geckos and Critters

State.Author: Inthegrave
State.Description: This mod fixes and improves vanilla game pathfinding errors and will provide a better and more challenging experience with the AI. This will be an ongoing project and will be supported with updates through the years. So look forward to many more updates to come.
State.Name: Improved AI (Navmesh Overhaul Mod)

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Overhaul of New Vegas's raider factions, balancing their loot and adding more of them to fight.
State.Name: Mojave Raiders

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This is simply a transliteration of the item value changes from TTW 3.3+, to make the economy make more sense, barter more important, and quest rewards actually consequential.
State.Name: SITE - Simple Item TTW Economy for NV

Original.Name: You Can Bleed Me Dry Anytime-82181-1-1689623331.rar

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: Inspired by Better Bleed Me Dry, this is a version of that idea that has extra features.
State.Name: You Can Bleed Me Dry Anytime

State.Author: zilav
State.Description: Decompresses the Fallout New Vegas BSAs and repacks them without zlib compression for performance, additionally transcodes the .ogg sounds effects to .wav so they work. It also extracts any mp3 files to loose files because they will not play when in a BSA.
State.Name: FNV BSA Decompressor

State.Author: migck
State.Description: Selectively detonate your C-4 charges by aiming your Detonator, and make other explosive weapons able to be remotely detonated.
State.Name: Detonator Overhaul

State.Author: jazzisparis
State.Description: An NVSE-powered plugin that is designed to manage and maintain all UI/HUD extensions added to the game by various mods. Once installed, UIO will ensure UI extensions are always properly installed and, when necessary, properly removed; it will automatically detect, resolve and prevent UI-related issues, and will help keep the game's UI intact.
State.Name: UIO - User Interface Organizer

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description: Adds a simple autocomplete when typing console commands, and a 'reverse search' to find recently entered commands.
State.Name: Basic Console Autocomplete

State.Author: Wall_SoGB
State.Description: Mod aims to fix some alpha rendering issues like broken effects when using Transparency Multisampling.
State.Name: Fallout Alpha Rendering Tweaks - NVSE

State.Author: The Dormies - Demorome and Trooper
State.Description:
An NVSE plugin which adds new functions and engine-level tweaks.

For heathens who have forsaken the Vanilla-Style way.
State.Name: ShowOff xNVSE Plugin

Original.Name: Alternate Start with Delayed Main Quest-82319-1-25-1695677345.7z

State.Author: hman101
State.Description: An alternate start mod that let's you choose your character's background and delays the main quest until you want to start it (or if you want just ignore it entirely).
State.Name: Alternate Start with Delayed Main Quest

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: Completely overhauls starting gear based on tagged skills, and contextually adds bonus starting equipment based on SPECIAL stats. Provides a set of formlists that can be changed to create your own custom starting gear. Also contains an example custom gear set that includes the courier's pack DLC.
State.Name: Dynamic Starting Gear Overhaul

State.Author: KaneWright
State.Description: This mod makes door window and small window under door semitransparent.
State.Name: Semitransparent Door Glass(plugin version)

State.Author: VishVadeva - Qolore7
State.Description: Files needed while following Viva New Vegas.
State.Name: Viva New Vegas Resources

State.Author: Qolore7
State.Description: Changes the amount of followers for you can have to your Charisma stat/2, rounded down (configurable). Charisma is no longer a dump stat!
State.Name: Follower Formula Redone

State.Author: team blackout
State.Description: scols, mopps, and adds nilodnodes to the mccarran tents and sandbags
State.Name: free camp mccarran performance

State.Author: AVeryUncreativeUsername
State.Description: Adds crafting stations and additional containers to several vanilla player homes.
State.Name: Home and Safehouse Tweaks

State.Author: KrazzyKlown and Nechigawara Sanzenin
State.Description: Fixed KrazzyKlown's RAD with vanilla Player Items Injection scripts. Also offer easy way to fix this problem for other mods.
State.Name: RAD - Radiation (is) Actually Dangerous - Overhaul - with Injection Fix

Original.Name: Strip Lights Region Fix - Uncut Wasteland-73596-Patch-1644119144.7z

State.Author: Nehred
State.Description: Fixes a vanilla issue about the Strip lights not showing in certain parts of the map.
State.Name: Strip Lights Region Fix

State.Author: S6S and Brandy
State.Description: A spiritual successor to Stat Choices, this mod provides a user-configurable choice of health, carry weight, or AP bonus on each level up. The improvements on the original include: user-configurable AP/carry weight increase values, and a dynamic check of the health-per-level gamesetting.
State.Name: Dynamic Level Stat Choice

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This is a lighter alternative to BLEED's damage overhaul. It includes bleeding effects bladed weapon hits that penetrate DT, formula based knockdown for blunt weapon and shotgun hits that penetrate DT, body part damage changes, a nerf to the overpowered knockdown perks, and a DT/DR/resistance overhaul for creatures.
State.Name: New Blood

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description: Engine plugin significantly improving the usability of the Caravan minigame. Optionally fixes AI bugs to make them a little smarter.
State.Name: Better Caravan

State.Author: Wall_SoGB
State.Description: Dynamically adjusts draw distance in accordance with the fog to improve performance with little to no visual difference.
State.Name: Fog-based Object Culling

State.Author: c6
State.Description: Improves game performance in combat by disabling lights produced by muzzle flashes.
State.Name: No Muzzle Flash Lights

State.Author: migck
State.Description: Fixes several problems at the core level with how ammo scripts and effects work, plus some tweaks for consistency and fun.
State.Name: Ammo Script Fixes

Original.Name: Brotherhood Gives ED-E Both Upgrades (No Plugin)-81512-3-0-1694215791.zip

State.Author: AVeryUncreativeTrooper
State.Description: Does what it says on the tin.
State.Name: ED-E My Love - Brotherhood Gives ED-E Both Upgrades

State.Author: AVeryUncreativeUsername
State.Description: Adds a simple player home to Jacobstown.
State.Name: A Very Uncreative Jacobstown Bungalow

State.Author: hman101
State.Description: A gold sink mod designed around allowing the player to spend caps to build outposts at locations in the Mojave for the faction of their choice. Designed for use alongside FPGE and TLD. Includes a TTW addon to claim locations in the Capital Wasteland.
State.Name: Claim the Mojave (and the Capital)

State.Author: JamesiaInc or Patchier
State.Description: Merge of some of my mods and changes for my WJ list, "I Can Hear Vegas Knocking"
State.Name: Patchy's 'I Can Hear Vegas Knocking' Merge

State.Author: Biggie404
State.Description: This mod will help improve many aspects of the landscape, most notably reducing landscape texture seams which are most apparent when using texture packs.
State.Name: Landscape Texture Improvements (FNV - TTW)

State.Author: VishVadeva
State.Description: Patches for TTW and FNV.
State.Name: Vish's Patch Hub (FNV-TTW)

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist
State.Description: Weapon Hotkey Icons!  adds custom icons for Weapons in the Hotkey.
State.Name: Weapon Hotkey Icons

State.Author: Roy Batty - nukem - lStewieAl - jazzisparis - WallSoGB - iranrmrf - LuthienAnarion - carxt
State.Description: Project to extend GECK functionality and bug fixes.
State.Name: GECK Extender

State.Author: Cyberlazy
State.Description: Vastly improves the LOD noise texture used on all distant land. Uses only minimal video memory and greatly improves quality.
State.Name: Improved LOD Noise Texture

State.Author: jazzisparis and LuthienAnarion
State.Description:
This plugin is an extension of the New Vegas Script Extender (NVSE). It adds 1000+ new functions, which can be used in GECK scripting and (in some cases) as conditions.

Additionally, this mod includes numerous engine bug fixes/tweaks, and restores several broken game features.
State.Name: JIP LN NVSE Plugin

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description: Rewrites various slow functions in the game to decrease loading/saving time and improve general performance.
State.Name: lStewieAl's Engine Optimizations

State.Author: Wall_SoGB
State.Description:
Fixes moonlight, making the moon the light caster instead of the sun.

Additionally fixes some other Sky related bugs.
State.Name: MoonlightNVSE

Original.Name: Texture Modding and High Res Preset-81231-10-2-2-1-1684772069.7z

State.Author: VishVadeva - WallSoGB - carxt
State.Description: Configurations for "New Vegas Tick Fix" to solve issues and improve performance based on your setup.
State.Name: NVTF - INI Presets

State.Author: yvileapsis
State.Description: Fork of Cobb's Crash Logger that implements logging for quite a few game RTTI classes. This is supposed to be a much more readable alternative that doesn't require reverse-engineering skills to figure out what went wrong.
State.Name: Yvile's Crash Logger

Original.Name: ED-E My Love - Followers Give ED-E Both Upgrades-83422-1-2-1697135320.zip

State.Author: AVeryUncreativeUsername
State.Description: The Followers will now give ED-E both the armor and weapon upgrades.
State.Name: ED-E My Love - Followers Give ED-E Both Upgrades

State.Author: doodlum
State.Description: Interior rain sounds powered by Climate Control NVSE.
State.Name: Interior Rain

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This is a carbon copy of my Scripted Weapon Tweaks' Nail Gun setting, sliced off as it's own esp-free tweak.
State.Name: Nail Gun Semi Auto Rework

State.Author: Krazzyklown
State.Description: Overhaul of xax34hah's RAD mod. Rewrote the entire UI portion, major changes to the script including rebalancing, bugfixes and compatibility patches..
State.Name: RAD - Radiation (is) Actually Dangerous - Overhaul

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This is a simple mod that distributes Wasteland Tequila. MREs, Battle Brew/Black Coffee, Nuka Cola Quantums, Daturana/Datura Hide/Datura Antivenom. Healing Poultices, Fiery Purgatives, Blood Shields, Snakebite Tourniquets, Weapon Binding Rituals, and Auto Inject Stimpaks around the wasteland.
State.Name: SIDE - Simple Items Distributed Everywhere

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: The Sweet 6 Shooter perk pack adds 99 perks and 22 traits in a vanilla friendly, immersive way. Featuring specialization perks for many weapon and armor types, this perk pack aims to flesh out the perk selection throughout the game for just about every playstyle, with a heavy focus on proper balance and role-playing.
State.Name: Sweet 6 Shooter Perks - TTW - NV

State.Author: Kiwi
State.Description: Fixes multiple pipboy:on nodes in the vanilla game armor meshes and TTW. As well as any other mods I decide to fix.
State.Name: PipBoyOn Node Fixes

State.Author: Machienzo and Mastahbossu
State.Description: Visual overhaul of characters' faces, vanilla aesthetics.
State.Name: Character Expansions Revised

State.Author: hman101
State.Description: A gold sink mod designed around allowing the player to spend caps to build outposts at locations in the Mojave for the faction of their choice. Designed for use alongside FPGE and TLD. Includes a TTW addon to claim locations in the Capital Wasteland.
State.Name: Claim the Mojave (and the Capital)

State.Author: shad0wshayd3
State.Description: Delay DLC for FNV and TTW 3.3, remade from the ground up
State.Name: Delay DLC Redux

State.Author: Sigourn
State.Description: Patches Character Expansions Revised for mods included in the Viva New Vegas guide.
State.Name: VNV Character Expansions Revised Patches

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Assorted changes to remove annoying features from some followers. Enhanced Sensors, Spotter and Search and Mark perk effects changed. ED-Es no longer 'whir' whilst moving.
State.Name: Follower Tweaks

State.Author: AVeryUncreativeUsername
State.Description: Allows you to convince the Followers to support Mr. House.
State.Name: House and Followers Truce

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Prevents the game becoming too easy by making enemies more likely to target the player in combat rather than companions.
State.Name: Player Combat Priority

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This is a reworked plugin for Skill Bonus Misc Items. The skill bonuses no longer stack, the item values are automatically tuned for TTW *if it's installed*, and the items can be found at a broader range of vendors, including those in DC.
State.Name: Skill Items Redux

State.Author: asorly
State.Description: Corrects several minor issues with the Strip's street lights.
State.Name: Strip Street Light Corrections

State.Author: PushTheWinButton and the New Vegas Mafia
State.Description: A collection of small vanilla-friendly gameplay improvements that have been fully merged, updated, and cleaned.
State.Name: Essential Vanilla Enhancements Merged

State.Author: c6 - carxt - lStewieAl
State.Description: PLAY THE GUITAR, PLAY IT AGAIN, MY JOHNNYYYYYYYYYYYY.
State.Name: JohnnyGuitar NVSE

State.Author: Carxt - Tgspy - lStewieAl
State.Description: The newest generation in performance enhancement and stutter fixing. Windows 10 compatible. Featuring fixes to the dreaded micro stutter, and a high FPS Havok fix.
State.Name: NVTF - New Vegas Tick Fix

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This esp-free file sets all creatures in the game with a karma level lower than zero to zero, to prevent gaining karma from killing them.
State.Name: Creatures Arent Evil

State.Author: zzjay
State.Description: replaces vanilla eyes textures
State.Name: Natural eyes by zzjay

State.Author: Audley
State.Description: A simple upscaling of the vanilla grass atlas from its low-quality 1k resolution to either your choice of 2k or 4k.
State.Name: Simply Upscaled Grass

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: The Sweet 6 Shooter perk pack adds 99 perks and 22 traits in a vanilla friendly, immersive way. Featuring specialization perks for many weapon and armor types, this perk pack aims to flesh out the perk selection throughout the game for just about every playstyle, with a heavy focus on proper balance and role-playing.
State.Name: Sweet 6 Shooter Perks - TTW - NV

State.Author: Joy
State.Description:
A few icons I drew for personal use with ySI, available as separate downloads with .json files already written. 

Currently provides patches for Bleedout and B42 Wristwatch, as well as an alternate soda bottle icon.

More may be added in the future.
State.Name: Joy's ySI Icons and Patches

State.Author: VishVadeva
State.Description: Patches for TTW and FNV.
State.Name: Vish's Patch Hub (FNV-TTW)

State.Author: AVeryUncreativeUsername
State.Description: Join some miscellaneous factions that you can't join normally.
State.Name: Friendly Misc Factions

State.Author: VishVadeva
State.Description: Patches for TTW and FNV.
State.Name: Vish's Patch Hub (FNV-TTW)

State.Author: team blackout
State.Description: completely arbitrarily changes a lot of perfect meshes for no reason
State.Name: skinned mesh improvement mod - redone redux remake retry revengeance retopology refridgerator

Original.Name: The Living Desert - Strip Lights Region Fix Patch-77945-1-0-1684074697.7z

State.Author: VishVadeva
State.Description: Patches for TTW and FNV.
State.Name: Vish's Patch Hub (FNV-TTW)

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: SImple and customisable reduced food healing effects, to help balance Survival versus Medicine. Affects all items, including from other mods.
State.Name: Food Effect Tweaks - Custom Food Healing

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description: Plugin to add clipboard paste support, as well as ctrl left/right and backspace/delete to aid typing in console.
State.Name: Console Paste Support

State.Author: Roy Batty - nukem - lStewieAl - jazzisparis - WallSoGB - iranrmrf - LuthienAnarion - carxt
State.Description: Project to extend GECK functionality and bug fixes.
State.Name: GECK Extender

State.Author: TommInfinite and everyone he copied code from
State.Description: NVSE plugin which adds new functions and allows modders to easily add new UI elements to the game (HUD Bars) and read Pastebin Pastes(Pastebin Reader), JSON functions.
State.Name: SUP NVSE

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This esp-free file restores the fatigue level of any robot-type creature to max on every hit, to ensure that they aren't knocked out.
State.Name: Robots Dont Dream Of Electric Sheep

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: The Sweet 6 Shooter perk pack adds 99 perks and 22 traits in a vanilla friendly, immersive way. Featuring specialization perks for many weapon and armor types, this perk pack aims to flesh out the perk selection throughout the game for just about every playstyle, with a heavy focus on proper balance and role-playing.
State.Name: Sweet 6 Shooter Perks - TTW - NV

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description: Add Ctrl-F to search in PipBoy, Container, Barter, Recipe, Levelup Perks and Save/Load menus.
State.Name: Menu Search

State.Author: MutfruitSalad
State.Description: I noticed that the workbench menus didn't capitalize their tab names. This fixes that.
State.Name: Crafting Consistency Fix

State.Author: zebumper
State.Description: Malcolm Holmes will wait for you to find some more sunset star caps before chasing you.
State.Name: Delayed Malcolm

State.Author: PlatinumShad0w
State.Description: Aims to make Charisma more significant to gameplay by having it scale the amount of Reputation received when helping or harming a faction.
State.Name: Hardcore Charisma (ShowOff NVSE)

State.Author: AVeryUncreativeUsername
State.Description: Mr. House no longer wipes out the Kings.
State.Name: House and Kings Truce

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: I always find that I have a tough time wanting to have dog companions around with non-essential followers, especially when their auto-healing is turned off, cause they get iced far too easily. This tiny patch to Player Combat Priority adds a second customizable value override for the chance for enemies to switch to targeting you instead of your dog
State.Name: Player Combat Priority Alt Chance To Attack Dog Patch

State.Author: Doros
State.Description:
Adds almost 100 songs split between five new radio stations, divided up by genre. Includes period-friendly rockabilly, big band, country and gospel, and pop rock tunes, as well as a Raider-controlled psychobilly station for the modern greaser in all of us.

UPDATE! Bonus Christmas radio station now available! Happy Holidays, Wastelands!
State.Name: Radio Free Wasteland

State.Author: VishVadeva - Qolore7
State.Description: Files needed while following Viva New Vegas.
State.Name: Viva New Vegas Resources

State.Author: Migck
State.Description: Implements a working gameplay system so that the Strength and Skill requirements that weapons list finally do something for ALL of them. Allows you to use any weapon, but the dynamic requirement penalties might make using them not so straightforward as before.
State.Name: Weapon Requirements System

State.Author: AVeryUncreativeUsername
State.Description: Makes the various Strip factions friendly after completing their respective quests.
State.Name: Friendly Strip Factions

State.Author: WallSoGB lStewieAl
State.Description: Fix for depth of field bleeding over onto player's viewmodel. Additionally fixes washed out colors caused by low bit depth.
State.Name: Depth of Field Fix - NVSE

State.Author: VishVadeva - WallSoGB
State.Description: Increases the resolution of local maps from 128 to 512, optionally you can change it to 256 or 1024.
State.Name: High Res Local Maps

State.Author: Nucleoprotein AKA virusek - Wall_SoGB
State.Description: Truly updated OneTweak.
State.Name: OneTweak but Really Updated

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This little mod just buffs benny's ammo and DT a little bit to help him have a little more survivability when fighting the player.
State.Name: Benny Fighting Chance

State.Author: doodlum
State.Description: Rain fixes and improvements powered by Climate Control NVSE. Supports 3D Rain.
State.Name: Climate Control - Rain

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This is a rebalance and overhaul of many base game perks, with many granting bonuses based on active SPECIAL values.
State.Name: Sweet Perk Overhaul

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description:
Lightweight mod adding timed autosaves, save slots and incremental/full save hotkeys. 

NVSE plugin with no esp or performance impact.
State.Name: Auto-Save Manager

State.Author: AM Team
State.Description: Adds simple lore friendly crafting recipes for chems! Buffout, Cateye, Radaway and more! Roleplay your Breaking Bad dreams!
State.Name: Another Simple Chem Crafting

State.Author: VishVadeva
State.Description: Patches for TTW and FNV.
State.Name: Vish's Patch Hub (FNV-TTW)

State.Author: EliteBane - Scott Clam - Ronivader
State.Description: A DNW-based weather mod that brings crisp color depth, realistic lighting and bright skies to the world of New Vegas.
State.Name: Desert Natural Realism - Redux

State.Author: Kormakur
State.Description: xNVSE plugin that enables having custom animations for weapons and actors. Fixes the engine-bound anim group limit problem.
State.Name: kNVSE Animation Plugin

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This small esp-free mod disallows the use of stealthboys in power armor.
State.Name: No Stealthboy In Power Armor

State.Author: Migck
State.Description: Gives the "swim" movement flag to the few vanilla creatures that have anims for that. Now you can be pursued on water by something else than mirelurks.
State.Name: Swimming Creatures Fix - ESPless

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This is just a little esp-free ScriptRunner script to set the projectile and ammo use of the Varmint Rifle and Ratslayer to .22LR. No other changes are made. Intended for use with JSawyer or some such mod that changes the leveled lists. This is just to render the need to patch Varmint Rifle replacers with JSawyer unneeded.
State.Name: Varmint Rifle 22LR Setter

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This small GameSetting tweak makes the economy harsher for characters with low barter, makes barter affect prices more, and slightly narrows the difference between max sell and min buy prices.
State.Name: Harder Barter Faster Stronger

State.Author: LTAM
State.Description: custom retexture of the pipboy perk images associated with the Fatigue Overhaul mod by StealthDick to fit with CPI icons
State.Name: Fatigue Overhaul x consistent pip-boy icons - perk and weapon icons

State.Author: Sigourn
State.Description: Patches Character Expansions Revised for mods included in the Viva New Vegas guide.
State.Name: VNV Character Expansions Revised Patches

State.Author: VishVadeva
State.Description: Patches for TTW and FNV.
State.Name: Vish's Patch Hub (FNV-TTW)

State.Author: S6S and Clavyn and Mr Shersh
State.Description:
This mod adds hitstop for melee weapons, by slowing down gametime to .1 for a few frames, then restoring it. Sounds still play normally, and the frame delay before returning to full speed is configurable.

You can also have a small image modifier applied with some blur to make the effect more prominent.
State.Name: Melee Hitstop Effects

Original.Name: Patchy's 'I Can Hear Vegas Knocking' Merge-82329-1-0-1690410313.rar

State.Author: JamesiaInc or Patchier
State.Description: Merge of some of my mods and changes for my WJ list, "I Can Hear Vegas Knocking"
State.Name: Patchy's 'I Can Hear Vegas Knocking' Merge

State.Author: Pelinor
State.Description: Allows any number of mods to be configured from a single menu.
State.Name: The Mod Configuration Menu

State.Author: Wall_SoGB
State.Description:
Allows for customizable bloom resolution, making it possible to use resolutions other than vanilla's quarter one.

Additionally allows to fully replace tone mapper and bloom with external ones like ReShade.
State.Name: High Resolution Bloom NVSE

State.Author: Wall_SoGB
State.Description: Fixes Pip-Boy's shading, making it not ignore lights around it
State.Name: Pip-Boy Shading Fix NVSE

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This small, esp-free mod makes vendors provide you with a full magazine of the relevant ammo when you purchase a ranged weapon.
State.Name: Full Mags

State.Author: S6S
State.Description:
I often forget to add a hardcore mode check when applying hardcore needs increases in mods, because I usually forget that non-hardcore is a thing.



This tiny scriptrunner will simply clear your hardcore needs when you go through any loading screen if you have them.
State.Name: Non-Hardcore Non-Zero Need Values Bandaid

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description: Holding a grenade before throwing it decreases its fuse.
State.Name: Cookable Grenades

Original.Name: FNV Clean Animations - Throwing Weapons Pack-81472-1-0-2-1696024042.rar

State.Author: rockbiter68
State.Description: Animation overhaul of all throwing axes and throwing spears in the game. No balance changes, as it adheres to vanilla timings. More visual clarity while aiming with throwing weapons. Uses and requires kNVSE.
State.Name: FNV Clean Animations - Throwing Weapons Pack

State.Author: iranrmrf

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: You know how there's that Van Graff's billboard ad that says "Fully Charged With No Extra Charge"? Well, now they actually *do* that! You get a free magazine of standard energy weapon ammo when you buy an energy weapon from Gloria Van Graff.
State.Name: Fully Charged With No Extra Charge - Van Graffs Truth In Advertising

State.Author: Roy Batty - LuthienAnarion

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This is a tweaked version of the Sunny Companion mod esm, with the dialog options for infinite ammo, essentiality, and perks disabled, regular weapon/ammo and armor, a Charisma check instead of speech, slightly rewritten dialog, no auto-healing after combat, and it's patched for Follower Formula Redone.

State.Author: iranrmrf
State.Description: This plugin fixes the Fallout New Vegas mod limit bug. It allows a maximum of 255 plugins to be loaded. It can also cause an increase in fps, remove game stutter and allow for faster loading times especially when using a large number of mods.
State.Name: FNV Mod Limit Fix
